review.title: “Can be a good place to work, but the senior management is not so good”
review.pros: Pros – flexibility of working anywhere in India especially in south india. Good opportunity of making a career in B2B sales in South.
review.cons: Cons – No good communication between senior management and employees. With some support employees really can do wonders but they dont help. YOU ARE ON UR OWN.All the senior management is the some way or the other related to the MD, cant complain anything about their mistakes.They just blame u for their mistakes.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Give good support to ur employees. It is necessary that a senior manager is present at all of ur potential areas.
